text: Kyiv Oblast (also known as Kiev Oblast) (, is an oblast (province) of central Ukraine. The administrative centre is Kyiv. The population of Kyiv Oblast was 1,723,000 in 2013. Economy: A rocket factory owned by Ukroboronprom (a company owned by the government) was damaged in April 2022 during the Russian-Ukraine war.https://direkte.vg.no/nyhetsdognet/news/russland-angrep-rakettfabrikk- utenfor- kyiv.PA4YtcB5_?utm_source=vgfront&utm;_content=direktewidget&utm;_medium=direktewidget_nyhetsdognet. VG.no. Retrieved 15 April 2022 ==References==
title: Kyiv Oblast
